item.title: Uncover password?
item.dc:creator: @Janca Janca
item.description:
@Janca wrote:

[code=java]public static String decryptBasicEncrypt(String s) {
for(int i = 97; i < 122; i++) {
char ascii = (char) i;
s = s.replaceAll("" + i, “” + ascii);
}

    for(int i = 65; i < 122; i++) {
        char ascii = (char) i;
        s = s.replaceAll("" + i, "" + ascii);
    }

    for(int i = 48; i < 57; i++) {
        char ascii = (char) i;
        s = s.replaceAll("" + i, "" + ascii);
    }
    return s;
}[/code]

There you go, btw doesnt support symbols only A-Z a-z and 0-9

Read full topic
